name: Credo
description: Credo (CREDO) is a token offered by BitBounce email service and the native currency of CredoEx exchange. Meant to reduce spam, users of the BitBounce service are said to earn Credo for emails received from unfamiliar senders, and according to BitBounce.com, users also have the option to spend the Ethereum-based token in order to send unsolicited emails.
